verses.verse: Now <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> was a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H802>prostitute:<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah.<s%>

<S%H1568>Gilead<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and when his <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> grew <S%H1431>up,<s%> they drove <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5157>him,<s%> "You shall not inherit in our <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> for you are the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>"

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob:<s%> and there were <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H582>fellows<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and they went out with <S%H3318>him.<s%>
It happened after a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> made <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It was <S%H1121>so,<s%> that when the children of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> made <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob;<s%>
and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come<s%> and be our <S%H7101>chief,<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>"

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H8130>"Didn't<s%> you hate <S%H1644>me,<s%> and drive me out of my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house?<s%> Why have you <S%H935>come<s%> to me now when you are in <S%H6887>distress?<s%>"

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> "Therefore we have turned <S%H7725>again<s%> to you <S%H1980>now,<s%> that you may go with <S%H3898>us,<s%> and fight with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%> and you shall be our <S%H7218>head<s%> over all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>"

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> "If you bring me home <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7218>me,<s%> shall I be your head?"

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> shall be <S%H8085>witness<s%> between <S%H1697>us;<s%> surely according to your word so will we <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H7101>chief<s%> over <S%H3316>them:<s%> and Jephthah <S%H1696>spoke<s%> all his <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What have you to do with <S%H935>me,<s%> that you have come to me to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against my <S%H776>land?<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> "Because <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H776>land,<s%> when he came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> even to the <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> and to the <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> now therefore restore that territory <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably.<s%>"
<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3316>Jephthah:<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>didn't<s%> take away the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> nor the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%>

but when they came <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%>

then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5674><s%> 'Please let me pass through your <S%H776>land;<s%>' but the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen. In the same <S%H7971>way,<s%> he sent to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> but he <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3478>not:<s%> and Israel <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%>

Then they went <S%H3212>through<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and went <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> by the east <S%H4217>side<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon;<s%> but they <S%H935>didn't<s%> come within the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> for the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> was the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>him,<s%> 'Please let us pass through your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> my <S%H4725>place.<s%>'

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H539>didn't<s%> trust <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>border;<s%> but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H3096>Jahaz,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and all his <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3478>them:<s%> so Israel <S%H3423>possessed<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H776>country.<s%>

They <S%H3423>possessed<s%> all the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> even to the <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> even to the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

So now <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> has <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and should you possess <S%H3423>them?<s%>

<S%H3423>Won't<s%> you possess that which <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> your <S%H430>god<s%> gives you to <S%H3423>possess?<s%> So whoever <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>us,<s%> them will we possess.

Now are you anything <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab?<s%> Did he <S%H7378>ever<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or did he <S%H7378>ever<s%> fight against <S%H3898>them?<s%>

While <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are along by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> why <S%H5337>didn't<s%> you recover them within that <S%H6256>time?<s%>

I therefore have not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6213>you,<s%> but you do me <S%H7451>wrong<s%> to <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3068>me.<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H8199>Judge,<s%> be <S%H8199>judge<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> between the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>"
However the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> which he sent <S%H7971>him.<s%>

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came on <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and from <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "If you will <S%H5414>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%>

then it shall <S%H3318>be,<s%> that whatever comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7725>me,<s%> when I return in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> it shall be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s, and I will offer it <S%H5927>up<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>"

So <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3068>them;<s%> and Yahweh <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

He <S%H5221>struck<s%> them from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> until you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4511>Minnith,<s%> even <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H58>to<s%> <S%H3754>Abelcheramim,<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%> So the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to his <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H1323>behold,<s%> his daughter came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him with <S%H8596>tambourines<s%> and with <S%H4246>dances:<s%> and she was his only <S%H3173>child;<s%> besides her he had neither <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

It <S%H7200>happened,<s%> when he saw <S%H7167>her,<s%> that he tore his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter!<s%> You have <S%H3766>brought<s%> me <S%H3766>very<s%> <S%H3766>low,<s%> and you are one of those who <S%H5916>trouble<s%> <S%H6475>me;<s%> for I have opened my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and I <S%H3201>can't<s%> go <S%H7725>back.<s%>"

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1>him,<s%> "My father, you have <S%H6475>opened<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me according to that <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H310>because<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>taken<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for you on your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> even on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>"

She <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father,<s%> "Let this <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H7503>me:<s%> let me alone <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> that I may <S%H3212>depart<s%> and go <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H1058>bewail<s%> my <S%H1331>virginity,<s%> I and my <S%H7464>companions.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go.<s%>" He sent her <S%H7971>away<s%> for <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months:<s%> and she <S%H3212>departed,<s%> she and her <S%H7464>companions,<s%> and <S%H1058>mourned<s%> her <S%H1331>virginity<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> that she <S%H7725>returned<s%> to her <S%H1>father,<s%> who <S%H6213>did<s%> with her according to his <S%H5088>vow<s%> which he had <S%H5087>vowed:<s%> and she was a <S%H3045>virgin.<s%> <S%H376><s%> It was a <S%H2706>custom<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

that the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3117>yearly<s%> to <S%H8567>celebrate<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in a <S%H8141>year.<s%>
